Large, pale green, translucent square platforms are visible, with one in the bottom-center foreground and others in the middle ground. Slender, reddish, organic-looking structures occupy the background, fading into a hazy, bright yellow light. As the character descends towards the bottom-left, the scene expands, revealing a dark, undulating ground in the foreground at the bottom of the frame, populated by small, silhouetted, mushroom-shaped forms.
